article_title: Four Republicans seek to oust incumbent
article_text: “We have lost the will to make use of our powers,” he says.

article_metadata.description: Editor’s note: Four contenders are competing in the Sept. 9 primary to become the Republican candidate to face U.S. Rep. Bill Keating in the 9th Congressional District election on Nov. 4. They are Mark Alliegro, John Chapman, Vincent Cogliano and Dan Shores. All four came to The Barnstable Patriot to be interviewed this week.         MARK ALLIEGRO   Mark Alliegro of Falmouth says his “short reason” for running for the 9th Congressional District seat
article_metadata.author: Susan Vaughn

og.description: Editor’s note: Four contenders are competing in the Sept. 9 primary to become the Republican candidate to face U.S. Rep. Bill Keating in the 9th
